name: encode_idr
title: IDR for ChIP-seq
summary: Generate peaks that pass the IDR threshold

outputSpec.name: empirical_curves_output
outputSpec.label: The output for plotting empirical curves

outputSpec.name: EM_parameters_log
outputSpec.label: The parameters estimated from EM and the log of consistency analysis

outputSpec.name: npeaks_pass
outputSpec.label: The number of peaks that pass specific IDR thresholds for pairwise analysis

outputSpec.name: overlapped_peaks
outputSpec.label: The full set of peaks that overlap between the replicates with local and global IDR
